column4: Okay, so I download an ISO image and run md5sum -b on it, a couple times, why the heck does the md5 hash keep returning different results?
sounds like a drive going bad right in front of your face
either that or the file is still downloading
heh, yes, it does, IMHO. I stopped dealing with Sony since they finally got caught steeling people's private information in nearly every single DVD they produced.
